# LLMs.txt - AI-Friendly Documentation Map
# Generated for Snake, Tron, Pac-Man Hybrid Game
# This file helps AI coding assistants navigate the repository efficiently

# Project Overview
- Project: Snake, Tron, Pac-Man Hybrid Game
- Type: Web-based JavaScript game
- Architecture: Modular vanilla JS with HTML5 Canvas
- Testing: Jest with JSDOM
- Linting: ESLint + Prettier

# Documentation Structure
- README.md - Project overview and setup
- docs/AGENTIC.md - AI-specific development guide
- docs/architecture.md - System architecture overview
- docs/design.md - Design decisions and rationale
- docs/api.md - API documentation and interfaces
- docs/testing.md - Testing strategy and patterns
- docs/development.md - Development workflow guide

# Source Code Structure
- index.html - Main game entry point (27 lines)
- style.css - Styling and visual design (80 lines)
- script.js - Core game logic (672 lines)
- script.test.js - Comprehensive test suite (501 lines)
- package.json - Dependencies and scripts (25 lines)

# Key Entry Points for AI Agents
1. **Game Initialization**: Start at index.html â†’ script.js init()
2. **Game Loop**: script.js update() function (lines 400-450)
3. **State Management**: gameState object (lines 50-100)
4. **Testing**: script.test.js for understanding expected behavior
5. **Styling**: style.css for visual components

# Development Commands
- npm test - Run test suite
- npm run lint - Run ESLint
- npm run format - Run Prettier
- xdg-open index.html - Launch game locally

# AI-Specific Notes
- All functions are documented with JSDoc-style comments
- Game state is centralized in gameState object
- Canvas dimensions: 400x400 pixels, 20x20 grid
- Key constants are defined at top of script.js
- Global exposure for testing: window.gameState, window.resetGame, etc.

# File Modification Guidelines
- Keep individual files under 500 lines
- Use descriptive function and variable names
- Add JSDoc comments for all public functions
- Update tests when modifying game logic
- Run linting and tests after changes
